1.心層の迷宮・<%sL_DUNG_NAME>へと通じる棺だ。|<end>: A coffin that leads to the Mind Maze's|<%sL_DUNG_NAME>.|<end>

3.レベル<%dM_DUNG_LV_NOW>の <%sL_DUNG_NAME>に行き: I'm on level <%dM_DUNG_LV_NOW> and I'm on|<%sL_DUNG_NAME>... The labyrinth level|doesn't go up when I clear it, is that okay?<yesno><close>

7.迷宮レベルを いくつに変えますか？|<end>: How many labyrinth levels would you like to|change?<end>

11.迷宮レベル<%dM_DUNG_LV_MAX>に 挑戦できるようになりました。|<: You can now challenge Maze Level <%dM_DUNG_LV_MAX>.|<end>

14.<pipipi_off>不明なエラーが 発生しました。|しばらくしてから やり直: <pipipi_off>I'm getting an unknown error. Please try|again in a few minutes.<pipipi_on><end>

15.心層の迷宮は アンルシアと仲間モンスターと共に|特徴が異なる３種類のダンジョンに:
This is a game where you'll be able to take|on three different types of dungeons, each|with its own unique characteristics. Each|
|time you complete a dungeon, your "labyrinth|level" increases by one, and the amount of|experience and gold you earn increases, but|
|the bosses also get tougher... The number of|dream chests in the labyrinth also changes|little by little... If you meet a certain|
|condition, you can change the level of the|labyrinth, so try to find a labyrinth that|suits you...

17.心の輝きは 迷宮内で画面左上に表示される|心のエネルギーです。|<br>|王家の:
The Glow of the Heart is the mental energy|displayed in the upper left corner of the|screen in the labyrinth. Unlike the Royal|
|Labyrinth's Glow of Courage, it doesn't|diminish over time, and is consumed when you|purchase the Dreaming Box or the Glow Fiend|
|effect... You can restore the glow of your|mind little by little by defeating monsters|in the labyrinth...

19.迷宮レベルは ダンジョンに入る前ならば|いつでも クリアしたことのあるレベルに|:
You can change your labyrinth level to any|level you've completed before entering the|dungeon. However, please note that clearing a|
|labyrinth of a lower level than the highest|level you can challenge will not raise your|labyrinth level...

21.<color_yellow>|迷宮レベルを 変えられるようになりました。|<en: <color_yellow>Now you can change the labyrinth level...<end>
